derivation: probably from the same base as G3145 (μηνύω) and G3415 (μηνύω) (i.e. , to strive);
strongs_def: to disclose (through the idea of mental effort and thus calling to mind), i.e. report, declare, intimate
outline:
1. to disclose or make known something secret
    1. in a forensic sense, to inform, report
  2. to declare, tell, make known
  3. to indicate, intimate
    1. of a teacher
